name: Beige 5 Pocket Suede
description:
Awesome and useful handmade leather suede and fur waist/hip belt bag with five pouches and two hidden pouches! Handmade in Jaipur, India.

Perfect for the man or woman on the go, this fashionable design features five pockets with flaps for easy access, with heavy duty metal buttons and high quality YKK zippers. Perfect for storing keys, coins, cell phones and other belongings! Two hidden pockets on the inside with zippers allow for storage of other valuables.

Size: 43 X 7 inch
Fits waist: 37 - 42 inch

Item ID: BB-VAL-5P-SUE-BRN

Need it fast? Normal shipping from here in India takes 10-21 business days. Add only $5 for Express 5-11 business days shipping, or only $10 for Super Express 3 business days shipping. Just click contact us to let us know. thanks!

description:

Perfect for storing keys, coins, cell phones and other belongings! Two hidden pockets on the inside with zippers allow for storage of other valuables.
